mapper.select: select commu_id, commu_title, commu_regist_date, commu_read_cnt, commu_cate_code, commu_mber_id from tb_commu where commu_status != 'Y' and commu_status != 'R' order by commu_id desc
select commu_id, commu_title, commu_cntnt, commu_regist_date, commu_update_date, commu_read_cnt, commu_cate_code, commu_mber_id from tb_commu where commu_id =#{commuId}

select commu_file_id, commu_file_name, commu_file_size, commu_file_ext, commu_file_path, commu_file_regist_date, commu_file_update_date, commu_file_commu_id from tb_commu_file where commu_file_commu_id=#{commuId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_commu (commu_id, commu_title, commu_cntnt, commu_cate_code, commu_regist_date, commu_mber_id, commu_status, commu_type, commu_read_cnt) VALUES (commu_seq.NEXTVAL, #{commuTitle}, #{commuCntnt}, #{commuCateCode}, #{commuRegistDate}, #{commuMberId}, 'N', 'N', 0)

insert into tb_commu_file (commu_file_id, commu_file_name, commu_file_size, commu_file_ext, commu_file_path, commu_file_regist_date, commu_file_commu_id) VALUES (#{commuFileId}, #{commuFileName}, #{commuFileSize}, #{commuFileExt}, #{commuFilePath}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'),#{commuFileCommuId})
mapper.select: SELECT commu_file_id AS "commuFileId", commu_file_name AS "commuFileName", commu_file_size AS "commuFileSize", commu_file_ext AS "commuFileExt", commu_file_path AS "commuFilePath", commu_file_regist_date AS "commuFileRegistDate", commu_file_update_date AS "commuFileUpdateDate", commu_file_commu_id AS "commuFileCommuId" FROM tb_commu_file WHERE commu_file_id=#{commuFileId}
mapper.update: update tb_commu set commu_title=#{commuTitle}, commu_cntnt=#{commuCntnt}, commu_update_date=#{commuUpdateDate}, commu_read_cnt=#{commuReadCnt}, commu_cate_code=#{commuCateCode}, commu_mber_id=#{commuMberId} where commu_id=#{commuId}

update tb_commu_file set commu_file_name=#{commuFileName}, commu_file_size=#{commuFileSize}, commu_file_ext=#{commuFileExt}, commu_file_path=#{commuFilePath}, commu_file_update_date= to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') where commu_file_id=#{commuFileId}
UPDATE tb_commu SET commu_status = 'Y' WHERE commu_id = #{commuId}
mapper.select: select commu_file_id, commu_file_name, commu_file_size, commu_file_ext, commu_file_path, commu_file_regist_date, commu_file_update_date, commu_file_commu_id from tb_commu_file where commu_file_commu_id=#{commuId}
